content.details: Successfully merged both TASK-007 and TASK-008 feature branches into main. Files now available at /agent_runner.py and /simulation/task_handlers.py. Both tasks marked as Done in TASK_CARDS.md.

Successfully reviewed and merged all PRs for TASK-009, TASK-010, and TASK-011. All files in place: /tests/test_agent_flow.py, updated /agent_runner.py with --init, and /tools/task_dispatcher.py. All tasks marked as Done in TASK_CARDS.md.

All outstanding PRs from Phase 1 sprint (TASK-012 to TASK-014) have been reviewed and merged. TASK-012 (central router), TASK-013 (inbox monitor), and TASK-014 (outbox visualizer) are now in main branch. All changes pushed to origin/main.

metadata.git_status: main branch fully synced with origin

content.details: Completed TASK-018: Rewritten and renumbered TASK_CARDS.md to fix task numbering conflicts. Moved TASK-011 through TASK-014 to completed section and renumbered future tasks starting from TASK-019. Organized backlog into Phase 2-4 with expanded descriptions. Ready for review.

changes: Added TASK-011 to TASK-014 as completed
Renumbered backlog tasks starting from TASK-019

content.details: Completed TASK-023C: Integrated agent learning into system execution. Added --use-learning flag to agent_runner.py, performance checking with warnings, and learning-based routing in router.py. Task logs now track when learning is applied.

changes: Integrated learning data loading and performance checking
Added learning_applied tracking to task logs
